Event.name: Achieving_first
Event.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Cognizer</fen> introduces a <fen>New_idea</fen> into society.
<ex>It is difficult to imagine how different our lives would be without <fex name="Cognizer">Edison's</fex> <t>invention</t> <fex name="New_idea">of the light bulb.</fex></ex>
</def-root>

Arg.name: Cognizer
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Cognizer</fen> comes up with or conceptualizes the <fen>New_idea</fen>. It is normally expressed as an External Argument: <ex><fex name="Cognizer">Kim Sung</fex> <t>invented</t> cinnamon cheez fries in 1988.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: New_idea
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>New_idea</fen> is a concept not previously present in society which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> introduces.</def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Cognizer</fen> comes up with the <fen>New_idea</fen>. <ex>The strong gravitic shield was <t>discovered</t> <fex name="Time">in 2162</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the <fen>Cognizer</fen> comes up with the <fen>New_idea</fen>. <ex>Was the light bulb <t>invented</t> <fex name="Place">in Austria</fex>?</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Means</fen> by which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> accomplishes the innovative achievement. <ex>Jo <t>invented</t> 550 different electronic devices <fex name="Mns">by tinkering with old cables</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Purpose</fen> for which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> creates the <fen>New_idea</fen> . <ex>He <t>invented</t> the holographic charge-distributor <fex name="Purp">to protect office buildings</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Explanation
Arg.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Explanation</fen> for which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> created the <fen>New_idea</fen>.
<ex>Wildcom <t>pioneered</t> the use of short wire segments <fex name="Explanation">because of rising wire costs</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Field
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Field</fen> is the general domain of endeavor to which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> is contributing and of which the <fen>New_idea</fen> is a part. <ex>These photochemical techniques were <t>pioneered</t> <fex name="Fld">in broadcasting</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Instrument
Arg.definition: <def-root>An entity used by the <fen>Cognizer</fen> to achieve the introduction of the <fen>New_idea</fen> into society.</def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition: <def-root>Any description of the creative event which is not covered by more specific FEs, including secondary effects (<ment>quietly, loudly</ment>), and general descriptions comparing events (<ment>the same way</ment>). In addition, it may indicate salient characteristics of a <fen>Cognizer</fen> that also affect the action (<ment>presumptuously, coldly, deliberately, eagerly, carefully</ment>). </def-root>

Arg.name: Basis
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The conceptual material from which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> invents the <fen>New_idea</fen>.
<ex>Galen <t>invented</t> the term 'gonorrhea' <fex name="Basis">from the words for genital and flow</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Location_of_appearance
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The Location_of_appearance is where the Invention is first discovered by others.
<ex>This term was <t>coined</t> by James Joyce <fex name="Location_of_appearance">in his second novel</fex>.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: pioneer.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: be the first to do something that becomes thereafter adopted as a common, accepted technique.

lexUnit.name: invent.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: create or design (a new device, process, etc.).

lexUnit.name: discover.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: be the first to find or observe (a place, substance, or scientific phenomenon).

lexUnit.name: coin.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: invent or devise (a new word or phrase).

lexUnit.name: coinage.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the process of inventing new words

lexUnit.name: discovery.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the act of finding something new to the world or one's social group

lexUnit.name: discoverer.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a person who discovers something new to the world or his or her social group

lexUnit.name: originator.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: one who creates a new practice or social institution

lexUnit.name: inventor.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: one who creates a new and useful device or process

lexUnit.name: invention.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the act of creating a new device or process for some useful end

lexUnit.name: pioneer.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: one who goes first into unknown territory or who is the first to develop a process or product in a new field of thought

lexUnit.name: pioneering.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: the activity of being a pioneer

lexUnit.name: find.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to invent; to discover something before anyone else

lexUnit.name: invention artifact.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the entity produced by the invention process.
